Class Topology

    public class Topology
extends PropertyContainer
implements Cloneable
    Represent a network topology
    Author:
    Lorenzo Saino

    • Method Detail

      • isDirected

        public boolean isDirected()
        Return the type of edges
        Returns:
        true if edges are directed, false

      • makeDirected

        public void makeDirected()
        Makes this topology directed. If it is already directed, nothing happens.

        public void addNode(String v,
           Node node)
        Add a node to the topology
        Parameters:
        v - The ID of the node
        node - The Node object

      • removeNode

        public Node removeNode(String v)
        Remove a node to the topology.
        Parameters:
        v - The ID of the node to remove
        Returns:
        The Node object removed if it was present in the topology. Otherwise, null is returned

      • getNode

        public Node getNode(String v)
        Return a specific node of the topology
        Parameters:
        v - The ID of the node
        Returns:
        The selected node, if present. Otherwise null is returned

      • getAllNodes

        public Set<String> getAllNodes()
        Return a set containing all the node IDs. To get the Node object of a specific node use getNode(String v)
        Returns:
        a set with all node IDs of the topology
        See Also:
        getNode(String)

      • numberOfNodes

        public int numberOfNodes()
        Return the number of nodes in the topology
        Returns:
        the number of nodes

      • addEdge

        public void addEdge(String u,
           String v)
        Add an edge to the topology. If the nodes connected by the edge are not present, they are created.
        Parameters:
        u - The start node
        v - The end node

      • addEdge

        public void addEdge(String u,
           String v,
           Edge edge)
        Add an edge to the topology. If the nodes connected by the edge are not present, they are created.
        Parameters:
        u - The start node
        v - The end node
        edge - The edge object

      • removeEdge

        public Edge removeEdge(String u,
              String v)
        Remove an edge from the topology
        Parameters:
        u - The start node
        v - The end node
        Returns:
        The removed egde, if it was present. Otherwise, null is returned.

      • getEdge

        public Edge getEdge(String u,
           String v)
        Return a specific edge in the topology
        Parameters:
        u - The edge start node
        v - The edge end node
        Returns:
        The selected edge, if present. Otherwise null is returned

      • getEdge

        public Edge getEdge(Pair<String,String> endpoints)
        Return a specific edge in the topology
        Parameters:
        endpoints - a pair containing edge endpoints
        Returns:
        The selected edge, if present. Otherwise null is returned

      • getAllEdges

        public Set<Pair<String,String>> getAllEdges()
        Return a set containing all the edge endpoints pair. To get the Edge object of a specific edge use getEdge(String v, String u)
        Returns:
        a set with all edge endpoint pairs of the topology
        See Also:
        getEdge(String, String)
